Context.HelpChapterUid:
--Departments if (IsNull(request("TableName"), "") = "Department") then "878F1D58-F1B0-42CB-A666-A2D397BD7ACB"
--Cost centers else if (IsNull(request("TableName"), "") = "ProfitCenter") then "FBA781DD-78F1-4C73-9502-503D1296E1DA"
--Locations else if (IsNull(request("TableName"), "") = "Locality") then "FB511EFB-43CD-488E-B7CA-3EF2E47C9E12"
--Business roles else if (IsNull(request("Area"), "") = "BusinessRoles") then "86174B55-9F89-4A46-BDF8-B66E275856CF"
--System roles else if (IsNull(request("Area"), "") = "SystemRoles") then "86174B55-9F89-4A46-BDF8-B66E275856CF"
--System entitlements else if (IsNull(request("Area"), "") = "SystemEntitlements") then "D529E375-00D2-451F-ABE0-131DBBC52EA6"
--Resources else if (IsNull(request("TableName"), "") = "QERResource") then "6B020098-4254-4740-991B-6E6E1C8A7FCD"
--Assignment resources else if (IsNull(request("TableName"), "") = "QERAssign") then "F82BE0F5-4FD5-4DC2-8B77-42284F28AF46"
--Multi request resources else if (IsNull(request("TableName"), "") = "QERreuse") then "C0811A15-0A74-46E2-A32F-F6925716E745"
--Multi requestable resources else if (IsNull(request("TableName"), "") = "QERReuseUs") then "F78C53F9-9BB0-4D65-B462-666F19D70D3C"
--Applications else if (IsNull(request("TableName"), "") = "application") then "C2A65C5B-8481-41C8-BD45-F875232465C2"
--Application roles else if (IsNull(request("Area"), "") = "AERole") then "AFC4B3C4-2AAD-40F0-9A47-719D5777642D"
--Everything that does not match the above else "5ED7E9A8-1174-41A3-AE6E-278E3BF201AD"

ConfigParam.Description: translate('#LDS#Employees who can be member of a application role as owner or attestor')
translate('#LDS#Employees for whom a membership can be requested')

FunctionValue.Expression: select ("OtherServices" as area, translate("#LDS#Heading Other Services") as caption)
select ("Organization" as area, translate("#LDS#Heading Organization") as caption)
select ("AERole" as area, translate("#LDS#Heading Application role") as caption)

Function.Name: Caption()
Function.Expression: if( NOT IsNullOrEmpty(Request('Title')) ) then Request('Title') else select top 1 caption from (captions()) where (area()=area)

FunctionValue.Expression: select ("Organization" as area, translate('#LDS#You are responsible for the following departments, cost centers and locations.') as caption)
select ("OtherServices" as area, translate('#LDS#You are responsible for the following resources.') as caption)
select ("AERole" as area, translate('#LDS#You are responsible for the following application roles.') as caption)

Container.Condition: Area() = 'Organization' and exists("Person", variable("uid_person = '%useruid%' and uid_person in ( select piae.uid_person from personinaerole piae join AERoleCollection aec on aec.UID_AERole = piae.uid_aerole where aec.UID_ParentAERole = 'QER-AEROLE-STRUCTADMIN-ADMIN')"))

Label.Text: translate("#LDS#This page shows organizational units you are directly responsible for. To view all organizational units, click here.")

Container.Condition: (Area() = "SystemRoles" or Request("TableName") in ("ESet", "QERAssign", "QERResource", "QERReuse", "QERReuseUS")) and exists("Person", variable("uid_person = '%useruid%' and uid_person in ( select piae.uid_person from personinaerole piae join AERoleCollection aec on aec.UID_AERole = piae.uid_aerole where aec.UID_ParentAERole in ('QER-AEROLE-STRUCTADMIN-ADMIN', 'QER-AEROLE-ITSHOPADMIN-ADMIN', 'RMB-AEROLE-ROLEADMIN-ADMIN'))"))

Label.Text: if(Request("TableName") = "QERResource")then translate("#LDS#This page shows resources you are directly responsible for. To view all resources, click here.") else if(Request("TableName") = "QERAssign")then translate("#LDS#This page shows assignment resources you are directly responsible for. To view all assignment resources, click here.") else if(Request("TableName") = "QERReuse")then translate("#LDS#This page shows multi-request resources you are directly responsible for. To view all multi-request resources, click here.") else if(Request("TableName") = "QERReuseUs")then translate("#LDS#This page shows multi-requestable/unsubscribable resources you are directly responsible for. To view all multi-requestable/unsubscribable resources, click here.") else if(Area() = "SystemRoles" or Request("TableName") = "ESet")then translate("#LDS#This page shows system roles you are directly responsible for. To view all system roles, click here.")
